title: Noise Barrier - means an exterior structure / part of structure designed to protect inhabitants of sensitive land use areas from noise pollution
clause_text: Noise Barrier - means an exterior structure / part of structure designed to protect inhabitants of sensitive land use areas from noise pollution.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
